string-array.name: crystal_afir_0
string-array.item: Relax and feel the energy of health which flows through your entire body
Starting from the head, flowing through the whole body and ending with the tiptoes
The energy of the crystal fills your body with health and strength. You feel relieved and energized
Your immunity and spirit are getting stronger

string-array.name: crystal_afir_1
string-array.item: You have a pleasant smile and a confident look on your face
You have a regal bearing. Relaxed shoulders
The energy of the crystal fills you with strength, you feel warmth in your hands. Hold this power by clenching your fist gently
Say mentally: “I influence people and events. This world is mine”

string-array.name: crystal_afir_2
string-array.item: Think about the issue that concerns you. Slow down. See how the whole world stops.
Switch off logic and thoughts. Trust yourself. You have no fears
You already have a ready-made solution, just see it. The power of the crystal helps you hear your intuition.
Wait for a feeling of relief: it’ll mean that you’ve heard a decision coming from the heart

string-array.name: crystal_afir_3
string-array.item: Breathe in and out calmly. Feel the balance within yourself
The crystal sends you a charge of energy, you disperse it throughout your body, it hits over the edge
Imagine doing what you love and getting great results
You control your life. You are happy with your achievements and multiply them

string-array.name: crystal_afir_4
string-array.item: Feel how you want to smile, your eyes burn with joy
You’re charming and allow yourself to be loved. You like people, you have a genuine interest in them
The energy of the crystal fills you with lightness and attractiveness
Say mentally: “I radiate love. My charm conquers the world!”

string-array.name: crystal_afir_5
string-array.item: Relax your shoulders and whole body. Feel the warmth and light in your heart
The light from your chest is love, every second it becomes brighter and fills all around
The love of the whole Universe is directed towards you through the crystal. You felt relieved.
Say mentally: “The world is beautiful, it loves me. Let me be happy!”

string-array.name: crystal_afir_6
string-array.item: Your body is relaxed and your mind is clear. You’re here and now.
Imagine that you have an unlimited amount of money on your bank card. You can buy anything in any country in the world
Say mentally: “I trust myself, I\'m lucky”
Mentally send this image of yourself to the crystal. The world now considers you advantaged and directs flows of money to you

string-array.name: crystal_afir_7
string-array.item: Breathe slowly. Inhale - exhale - pause
You have now stopped all your business. You’re surrounded by peace. Peace guards you.
The crystal fills every cell of your body with tranquility. Your body is getting heavy and your head is clear and light.
You’re power. You’re calmness. Nothing can move you
